articles.title: Virus stops play: Over a dozen players test positive, India out of women’s Asian Cup - The Indian Express
articles.description: It is learnt that almost a dozen members of the Indian camp tested positive for the virus, leaving them with no other option but to pull out of the crucial encounter, thus leaving their campaign in tatters.
articles.content: For two years, the Indian womens football team had been preparing for its biggest tournament so far: the Asian Cup. However, after playing just one match, they had to withdraw from the continental ch… [+6321 chars]

articles.author: Jugjet Singh
articles.title: India thrash Malaysia 9-0 in Asia Cup - New Straits Times
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR: As  expected, the Malaysian women’s hockey team were crushed 9-0 by Asia Cup defending champions India at the Sultan Qaboos Stadium in Muscat, Oman, today.
